original_title: Pastor Jerome Fernando remanded until the 3rd of January
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Pastor Jerome Fernando has been remanded until January 03 after being produced to the Hulftsdorp Magistrate's Court today.
Pastor Fernando was arrested when he arrived at the Criminal Investigations Division on the 1st of December 2023 to record a statement against the order of the Court of Appeal.
The chieftain or the main ‘kapu mahatha’ of the Kataragama Maha Devalaya, arrested by the Colombo Crimes Division.
Kudu Roshan and others were arrested by the ‘Yukthiya’ operation
Immunoglobulin Probe Intensifies: Former Health Secretary & Key Figures in Court
